articles.title: SailPoint, Inc (SAIL) Integrates Its Identity Security Cloud with the CrowdStrike’s Falcon
articles.mainIdea: SailPoint, Inc (SAIL) Integrates Its Identity Security Cloud with the CrowdStrike’s Falcon
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: SailPoint, Inc (SAIL) Integrates Its Identity Security Cloud with the CrowdStrike’s Falcon. SailPoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:SAIL) is one of the Best Young Tech Stocks to Buy. On December 18, SailPoint, Inc. (NASDAQ:SAIL) announced the integration of its SailPoint Identity Security Cloud with the CrowdStrike Falcon platform. Management noted that the integration connects the identity management with advanced threat detection tools. This will enable organizations to spot and respond […] Related tickers mentioned: SAIL.

articles.title: Jim Cramer Says “I Own Apple, and I Say Own it, Don’t Trade It”

articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Jim Cramer Says “I Own Apple, and I Say Own it, Don’t Trade It”. Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer answered questions about. Playing the round of “Am I Diversified?”, a caller mentioned that their top five holdings are NVDA, CRWD, AAPL, GS, and HOOD. Cramer remarked: “Interesting… We’ll do some, set some time on this. Alright, CrowdStrike, we know… amazing cybersecurity company. NVIDIA… That’s […] Related tickers mentioned: AAPL, GS, HOOD, NVDA.

articles.title: How a String of Hacks Embarrassed Cyber Powerhouse Israel
articles.mainIdea: How a String of Hacks Embarrassed Cyber Powerhouse Israel
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: How a String of Hacks Embarrassed Cyber Powerhouse Israel. Groups linked to Iran have used relatively simple techniques to leak internal emails and documents, experts say.
